mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (id,password) VALUES (#{id},#{password}); INSERT INTO member VALUES ((SELECT MAX(mno) FROM account),#{name},#{phone},#{birth},#{address},#{email});

choose.when: UPDATE account SET password=#{password} WHERE mno=#{mno};

mapper.select: SELECT ac.mno as no, id, password, mname as name, phone, birth, address, email FROM account ac, member mb WHERE ac.mno=mb.mno AND ac.mno=#{mno}
